6853:
Wandering about in a universe
Back and forth - torn
Strandgoods of the galaxies
Back and forth - torn
Exhausted, starved, yet still a hunter
Hidden, lurking behind some planets
in narrow lanes, in narrow lanes

Dark star you are the light of my night
...

There is no peace in heaven
There is no peace on earth
There is no love in heaven
There is no love on earth
There is no faith in heaven
There is no faith on earth
There is no hope in heaven
There is no hope on earth

So you go round and round
Another live another wound
From death to birth, from birth to death
No time to waste, no time to rest
So you go round and round
...

Walked through the sand, the sand, soft and white
and felt the sun, the sun, warm and bright
and saw the ocean, ocean blue
and thoughts, thoughts, came
thoughts of you...
Down, down, down
i'm feeling down
down, down, down
...

I dreamed of a beautiful garden
of flowers and meadows in may
when days passed like the golden sun
and troubles seemed far away

But when I awoke there was no sun
and the wind blew cold and strong
I felt sick and felt alone
I saw flowers painted on stone
...

Waiting for the dawn
Waiting for the night
Waiting for the dawn
Waiting for the night

The day's too long
The day's too bright
The day's too long
The day's too bright

Love me,
love me to the end
this man pursues you
...

Looking, searching, for something to share
You don't know where to guide me
Take away this world called sadness
Some of us will dream it forever
They don't know where to hide it
They just keep on traveling round
But I know I can't keep going
And I don't know what ties me down

...

The days gone by, remembered well
The sound gone by without your kiss
The sound gone by without you...
The nights so long in golden rooms
my heart so strong in strangest mood
my heart so strong in strangest...
The voice from heaven far above
My eyes look up and touch you...

...

When I heard you calling my name
I was drowned in the blue
Blackbird sang on a tree
I was drowned in the blue...

...

I came from far, came from nowhere
Over the sea, came through the air

Give me your love
Give me your love
Give me your love
Give me your love

Call me a fool, call me a dreamer
Call me a fool, call me a dreamer
The killer hidden in a video game
who are the victims, no one to blame

All you have seen, lies and lies and lies
on TV-Screen, lies and lies and lies
